mapper.update: update notice_board set bstep=bstep+1 where bgroup=#{bgroup} and bstep>#{bstep}
update notice_board set bhit=bhit+1 where bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from notice_board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) a) where rnum= (select rnum from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from notice_board order by bgroup desc, bstep asc) a) where bid=#{bid})-1

select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from notice_board where btitle like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) a) where rnum= (select rnum from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from notice_board where btitle like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by bgroup desc,bstep asc) a) where bid=#{bid})-1
